entry.title: The Architecture of Us: A Year of Mending
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,044Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: From pining teenager to resident warlock of Beacon Hills, Stiles Stilinski spent years loving Derek Hale from the shadows, watching him build a pack that had no place for him. Misunderstandings, missed invitations, and a regifted compass built a fortress of heartbreak between them. But when a single moment of raw truth shatters the silence, they begin a year-long journey of mending. Through quiet gestures, earned trust, and the slow integration of pack and heart, they dismantle the walls, brick by brick, learning that the very scars of their past could become the foundation for an unshakable future, and a love written in stone.

  • Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Derek Hale/Stiles Stilinski

entry.title: I'm Just a Boy, Not a Hero (Just a Boy, Who Had to Sing this Song)
entry.summary:
Author: am0rawr

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,914Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: After the nuclear war, the world was divided between what remained of the earth and what turned to ash. From the ruins, the Argent Empire rose — a kingdom of steel and silence, where luxury hides fear and obedience is law. Inside the palace, Mieczysław lives as a living ornament, a prisoner among gold and glass, his existence shaped to please the man who destroyed everything he once loved. In the shadows, Derek Hale carries the weight of a murdered family. He enters the palace seeking vengeance — and finds, at the heart of his enemy, something he never expected: someone just as captive as himself. What begins as rebellion becomes a dangerous bond, woven from pain, desire, and silence.A forbidden love, born within the ruins — strong enough to reignite everything the empire tried to erase.

entry.title: Inciting Spark
entry.summary:
Author: LLN3dseestheLight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,564Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 27

Summary: After Tobias Budge attacked Hannibal Lecter, Will Graham gets a phone call, his friend, John Stilinski, is dead, and his son, Stiles Stilinski, is in a coma. Will goes to Beacon Hills to Stiles. Emerging from a three-week coma, Stiles was told that his father, John Stilinski, had died in the accident that led to his coma, and that he had to find himself back in 2013. But that wasn't his most significant issue. No, it was the fact that in this reality, Will Graham was his biological father. Someone Stiles, only known as a TV show character!

entry.title: The Howling Silence.
entry.summary:
Author: DarkInsanity (Stereklenidus)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,412Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 102

Summary: For years, Stiles Stilinski loved Derek Hale from the shadows, a master of quiet yearning. He watched Derek build a pack, a family, a life that had no place for a warlock's heart. Through birthdays forgotten, invitations missed, and a compass regifted, Stiles learned the painful architecture of unrequited love, folding his hope away until it was brittle. But when a threat in a dusty magic shop finally shatters Derek's control, the raw, possessive truth comes howling out. The question is, after so many years of silence, is Stiles still brave enough to reach for it?

entry.title: The Tears We Cry
entry.summary:
Author: Oli_Umbra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,687Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 39

Summary: Stiles nodded, unable to speak, a knot of dread tightening in his stomach. He could feel Szymon's breath on his skin, warm and damp. "Good," Szymon whispered. "That's a good boy." He squeezed Stiles' shoulder, a pressure that was both reassuring and threatening. Then he stood up, the mattress springing back. "Get some sleep." He walked to the door, pausing to look back. "Remember, Stiles. I'm here for you. For anything." The door clicked shut, and Stiles was alone in the moonlight again. But the peace was gone, replaced by a cold dread that settled deep in his bones. He didn't move for a long time, just stared at the door, listening to the silence. He knew, with a certainty that chilled him to the core, that things had just gotten much, much worse.

entry.title: You Can't Break Me (I'm already broken)
entry.summary:
Author: RayGracy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,647Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: "Take heart, for when Albion's need is greatest, Arthur will rise again."Arthur does indeed "rise again," but not where Merlin was expecting him to, not where Merlin has been waiting for 1500 years. Instead, he shows up in present day Beacon Hills, the prat.
